title: Positive sentiment flows from US economic growth data
summary: Local shares are poised to edge higher as Wall Street advanced on signs the US economic expansion is gathering momentum.
author: Timothy Moore

title: Australian shares to rise, N Korea tensions ease
summary: Local shares are poised to rise amid a focus on both economic data and earnings. Base metals higher. $A flat.
author: Timothy Moore

title: ASX poised to edge higher as Harvey soaks sentiment on Wall Street
summary: Australian shares are poised to edge higher, following New York, as Hurricane Harvey hammered the price of oil.
author: Timothy Moore

title: ASX set for slight rise after Wall St investors seek tax reform
summary: Australian stocks are poised to open higher, helped by a modestly positive session on Wall Street. ASX futures up 6 points.
author: Timothy Moore

title: Equities pause ahead of Janet Yellen
summary: Global investors are fixed to the sidelines as they await a speech by Janet Yellen. ASX futures flat. $A little changed.
author: Timothy Moore

title: Risk-off sentiment depresses Wall St
summary: ASX futures are pointing to a positive open, even as all three major US benchmarks slide lower. $A flat.
author: Timothy Moore

title: Miners, techs pace global stocks higher
summary: Optimism about the outlook for miners, including BHP and Rio, has helped paced markets higher. ASX futures up 32pts.
author: Timothy Moore

title: Equities pause even as metals shine
summary: Global equities paused overnight, even as base metals extended their recent advances. Iron ore nears $US80 a tonne.
author: Timothy Moore

title: ASX to open flat while S&P 500 resiliency is tested even as iron ore, oil surge
summary: Australian shares are set to open flat, even after iron ore and oil leapt higher over the weekend. Wall St slipped. $A advanced.
author: Timothy Moore

title: ASX poised to fall as risk aversion rises
summary: ASX shares are poised to drop at the open, following Wall Street which was roiled by concerns about political chaos in the US.
author: Timothy Moore

title: Miners poised to lead ASX higher
summary: A surge in base metal prices is poised to propel the ASX higher at the open. BHP was up 2.8% in New York. $A surges 1.4%.
author: Timothy Moore

title: ASX futures dip ahead of reporting wave
summary: A wave of earnings statements will set the tone for the open after a mixed session on Wall Street. $A extends slide.
author: Timothy Moore

title: Global investors refocus on earnings, as US v North Korea rhetoric eases
summary: Overseas shares rallied overnight as investors bet on improved prospects for corporate profits. ASX futures +23pts.
author: Timothy Moore

title: ASX set to open flat as low US inflation eases North Korean angst
summary: Wall Street edged higher as the latest inflation print lessened the case for a third US rate hike this year. ASX futures are flat.
author: Timothy Moore

title: ASX poised to join global retreat
summary: Global markets retreated at a faster pace overnight and the ASX is poised to drop at the open. ASX futures down 68 points.
author: Timothy Moore

title: ASX futures up ahead of earnings from AGL, AMP, MFG and ORA
summary: Concern about rising tensions between the US and North Korea put investors on the defensive overnight. AGL, AMP report today.
author: Timothy Moore

title: ASX futures pare gains, Wall St sinks as Trump shatters calm
summary: Futures pulled back after President Donald Trump escalated the war of words with North Korea. CBA reports blockbuster profit.
author: Timothy Moore

title: ASX poised to edge higher
summary: Local shares are set to edge higher with the Dow on track to close at a record high for the ninth straight day.
author: Timothy Moore

title: ASX to open higher after Dow extends winning streak
summary: The Dow lifted for an eighth consecutive day as the latest US jobs data backed the Federal Reserve's bias to tighter policy.
author: Timothy Moore

title: Flat local open ahead of RBA economic forecasts
summary: Local shares are poised to open little changed as earnings season edges towards its peak amid high expectations. $A slips.
author: Timothy Moore

title: ASX advance could be checked by Rio, Wall St edges higher
summary: Local shares could be checked in the wake of Rio Tinto's results and profit-taking on Wall Street.
author: Timothy Moore

title: ASX poised to drift lower as commodities retreat
summary: Iron ore, oil and base metals drifted lower overnight setting the stage for a modestly lower local open. $A down 0.5%.
author: Timothy Moore

title: BHP, Rio poised to lift ASX ahead of RBA rate call
summary: While ASX futures are pointing to a flat open, the US listed shares of BHP and Rio are higher on gains in iron ore and oil.
author: Timothy Moore
